title: Picasso the sculptor
creator_credit: Arts Council of Great Britain and Roland Penrose
brief_description: Surveys the sculpture of Picasso from the early figurative heads of 1902-l903; the cubist constructions of 1912-l924; his carved and modelled figures of the 1930’s; his bronze assemblages and ceramic sculptures of the 1940’s and the 1950’s, to the sheet metal cut-outs of the sixties.
creator_credit_for_label: Arts Council of Great Britain and Roland Penrose
